name: framework7-template-vue-simple
description: Simple Framework7 Vue starter app template

scripts.copy-f7: cpy node_modules/vuetify/dist/vuetify.min.css www/libs/vuetify && cpy node_modules/vuetify/dist/vuetify.min.js www/libs/vuetify && cpy node_modules/lodash/core.min.js www/libs/lodash && cpy node_modules/vuex/dist/*.* www/libs/vuex && cpy node_modules/vue2-google-maps/dist/utils/*.* www/libs/vue2-google-maps/utils && cpy node_modules/vue2-google-maps/dist/*.* www/libs/vue2-google-maps && cpy node_modules/vue2-google-maps/dist/components/*.* www/libs/vue2-google-maps/components && cpy node_modules/framework7/js/*.* www/libs/framework7/js && cpy node_modules/framework7/css/*.* www/libs/framework7/css && cpy node_modules/framework7-vue/*.* www/libs/framework7-vue/ && cpy node_modules/vue/dist/*.* www/libs/vue/ && cpy node_modules/framework7-icons/fonts/*.* www/fonts && cpy node_modules/material-design-icons/iconfont/*.{eot,ttf,woff,woff2} www/fonts

author: Vladimir Kharlampidi
